Heading: XYY?
Value: No but Chikatilo’s blood was Type A, but his sperm was type AB, this was a one in a million chance.

Heading: Raised by
Value: Mother; his father went to war

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: Yes, was bullied and called names

Heading: Physical defect?
Value: Yes he was nearsighted but was too afraid/embarrassed to tell anyone about it

Heading: Head injury?
Value: Lesions on brain and water on the brain at time of birth

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Chikatilo was always mocked for his impotence and that people always teased him all through his life

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: 18, jumped on a girl who was 13, wrestled her to the ground and ejaculated as the girl struggled in his grasp.

Heading: Age when first had intercourse
Value: 19; he tried twice but his attempts we unsuccessful

Heading: Highest degree
Value: Bachelor’s degree in Literature and Philology

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Fired from jobs?
Value: Yes, 3-5 teaching jobs (1 asked to resign or be fired)

Heading: Sexual preference
Value: Hetero but some sources say homo

Heading: Bed wetting
Value: Yes, mother would beat and humiliate him for it

Heading: Been to a psychologist?
Value: Yes his wife made him go get help with his un-productive/impotent sex life

Heading: Time in forensic hospital?
Value: Yes when he was going through his trial Yes when he was going through his trial

Heading: Diagnosis
Value: Sane even though the court thought he was insane

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes he committed other crimes than the killings

Heading: Spend time in jail?
Value: Yes but not for the 52+ killings it was for other crimes

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Type of victim
Value: Young women, prostitutes, alcoholics, mentally disturbed women and children(boys and girls) and teenagers

Heading: Type of serial killer
Value: Disorganized Serial Killer and missionary because he began to see himself not as a killer but a cleanser of society (The Red Ripper pg 75)

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: A lot of his killing were on trips and at various train stations all over Russia, very few were committed close to his home

Heading: Location of killing
Value: All in secluded areas off of streets and side roads

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Value: Yes; bought a second house for sex and then killed the girls and threw the bodies in the woods and rivers

Heading: Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Quick & efficient?
Value: Sometimes but sometimes he would tortured the victim for a while and kept them alive.

Heading: Used blindfold?
Value: Yes, so if the bodies were found the police could not see who the killer was; because some say that the imprint of the killer stays on the eyes when you die.

Heading: Ate part of the body?
Value: Yes the tips of tongues, nipples, genitals were cut off. The cutting off and even chewing the genitals became a ritual of Chikatilo. Unlike a cannibal, he does not actually appear to have

Heading: Took totem – personal item
Value: No, but he would take their clothes and or their purses and throw them deeper into the woods or somewhere around the victim.

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Value: No he would always try to hide or cover up the body

Heading: Left at scene, buried
Value: Yes, he only buried a couple of them

Heading: Moved, no attempt to hide
Value: Yes he threw some of them in the river

Heading: Cut-op and disposed of
Value: Cut off body parts and would then stomp on them

Heading: Killer executed?
Value: Yes gunshot to the back of the head

Heading: Did killer plead NGRI?
Value: No but everyone thought he was crazy
